# Test cases for test_abs: abs(a)
# Format: a dummy expected (result = |a|)
# Note: dummy parameter is ignored (used for framework compatibility)
# Special case: abs(INT32_MIN) overflows to INT32_MIN

# 1. Positive Numbers (remain unchanged) (20 cases)
